Key Match Events: Christian Benthancourt hit a two-run double in the eighth inning
Ian Happ knocked in an RBI with a single in the eighth inning
Mike Tauchman and Seiya Suzuki had RBI singles in the ninth inning
Chicago Cubs scored six runs in the ninth inning to turn a 10-3 deficit into a 14-10 victory
Post-Match Reflections: This win could be a season-defining victory for the Cubs
The franchise and fan base may look back on this win as a turning point that helped propel them to the playoffs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul Skenes pitched five solid innings for the Pirates
Kyle Hendricks gave up six earned runs in 1.2 innings
David Bednar struggled in the ninth inning, allowing six runs
